since last year there has been an increase in violence these southern areas where taliban rebels have increased their attacks on the afghan and international armies of south incidents assaults rebel army coalition forces witnessed insurgents surged over past as fighters intensified troops rate those rebellions parts repression from talibans extremism rise regions afghani governments that area were problems revolts attacked afghanistan military bainul aqwani only risen when afghans conflict members un which some fighting between rand regiosn
